enhanced_by.reason: Both methods handle joining collections of strings with a separator, making them suitable for setting up similar test cases.
This method also joins strings with a separator, providing a similar setup for test cases.
Both methods manipulate strings and return a modified string, making the output of normaliseWhitespace useful for constructing assertions.
isBlank can be used to assert the presence or absence of whitespace in the joined string, providing a useful comparison point.
